text:
Tristan Thompson goes into fashion. Even if his personal life is currently in pieces he is thinking of building his own brand. The basketball player has filed for a trademark (a letter T), according to E! News who managed to obtain the documents.

It seems that the papers have been filed on April 23 and they involve ‘Athletic apparel, namely, shirts, pants, jackets, footwear, hats, and caps being headware, athletic uniforms.’

We know that you’re aware of the fact that Tristan’s name has been all over the news and probably every human being on this planet knows that he cheated on his baby mama, Khloe Kardashian.

We also heard that his first baby mama Jordan Craig is also angry because he has been neglecting his son since all this mess started.

regarding what’s been going on with Khloe, insiders claim that she has not given up on her relationship with Tristan, at least not yet.

‘She has one foot out the door but is also holding on to the fact that she and Tristan can make it work,’ the source claimed.

Advertisement

‘She hasn’t given up on him yet but also hasn’t really been focusing on their relationship. When they see each other, it is all about the baby and parenting together. Khloe has fallen in love with him all over again, watching him be a dad to True, but [she also] knows she needs to really take a step back and make the right decision.’
title: Tristan Thompson Is Starting An Athletic Apparel Line Amidst The Neverending Cheating Scandal
